pr_title: HDDS-4309. Fix inconsistency recon config keys starting with recon and not ozone

timeline.message: Fix inconsistenc recon config keys starting with recon and not ozone

timeline.author: adoroszlai

replies.bodyText: You are right, I just added these deprecated configurations in a new commit!
replies.author: frischHWC

timeline.author: adoroszlai

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/hadoop-ozone/recon/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/recon/spi/impl/OzoneManagerServiceProviderImpl.java b/hadoop-ozone/recon/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/recon/spi/impl/OzoneManagerServiceProviderImpl.java
index 1a2ef7439a..411d6c53c2 100644
--- a/hadoop-ozone/recon/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/recon/spi/impl/OzoneManagerServiceProviderImpl.java
+++ b/hadoop-ozone/recon/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/ozone/recon/spi/impl/OzoneManagerServiceProviderImpl.java

@@ -206,11 +218,15 @@ public void start() {
     reconTaskController.start();
     long initialDelay = configuration.getTimeDuration(
         OZONE_RECON_OM_SNAPSHOT_TASK_INITIAL_DELAY,
-        OZONE_RECON_OM_SNAPSHOT_TASK_INITIAL_DELAY_DEFAULT,
+        configuration.get(
+            ReconServerConfigKeys.RECON_OM_SNAPSHOT_TASK_INITIAL_DELAY,
+            OZONE_RECON_OM_SNAPSHOT_TASK_INITIAL_DELAY_DEFAULT),
         TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
     long interval = configuration.getTimeDuration(
         OZONE_RECON_OM_SNAPSHOT_TASK_INTERVAL_DELAY,
-        OZONE_RECON_OM_SNAPSHOT_TASK_INTERVAL_DEFAULT,
+        configuration.get(
+            ReconServerConfigKeys.RECON_OM_SNAPSHOT_TASK_INTERVAL_DELAY,
+            OZONE_RECON_OM_SNAPSHOT_TASK_INTERVAL_DEFAULT),
         TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
     scheduler.scheduleWithFixedDelay(() -> {
       try {

timeline.message: HDDS-4309 . add old ozone recon keys as deprecated
HDDS-4309. add unit test deprecated config keys
